description: From a series of 12 lithographs produced for Der Mantel (The Coat) by Nicolai Gogol, Kiepenheuer Verlag, Potsdam-Berlin, 1919; man in a black coat stands next to a window with rays coming through it; he holds a piece of his coat in his hand
inscription: LL margin of sheet, in pencil: Probedruck. E.57-III | URC of sheet, in pencil: 3 | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 12170 | ULC of sheet in pencil, on verso: #1935 | LRC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 106.--
portfolio: From Plate 3 from Der Mantel (The Coat), Nicolai Gogol, Kiepenheuer Verlag, Potsdam-Berlin, 1919
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 18 | LL in pencil, below image: Zu Gogol : der Mantel
title: Akaki Shows the Tailor the Areas to Be Repaired, Plate 3 from Der Mantel (The Coat)
